00001 #include "bphylib.h"
00002 #include "mathtools.h"
00003 
00010 target::target(double Zt, double At, double nt, double EI, double Zp, double Ap, double gamma0, double circum)
00011 {
00012  It=EI; 
00013  beta0  = sqrt((gamma0*gamma0-1.0)/(gamma0*gamma0)) ;
00014  xi=1.0e6*0.1535*pow(Zp,2)*Zt/pow(beta0,2)*mp*1.0e3*nt*1.0e-4; // in eV
00015  Emax=1.0/qe*2.0*me*pow(clight*beta0*gamma0,2)/(1.0+2.0*gamma0*me/(Ap*mp)+pow(me/(Ap*mp),2));  // in eV
00016  kappa=xi/Emax;
00017 
00018  double f0 = beta0*clight/circum;
00019  E_rms_2=xi*Emax*(1.0-0.5*pow(beta0,2)); // in eV
00020  double Ekin=Ap*(gamma0-1.0)*mp*pow(clight,2)/qe;  // in eV
00021  delta_rms_2=pow(gamma0/(gamma0+1.0),2)*E_rms_2/pow(Ekin,2); 
00022  E0=gamma0*mp*Ap*pow(beta0*clight,2)/qe; // in eV
00023 }
00024 
00032 double target::energyloss(double f0, double dt) 
00033 {
00034  //return 2.0*xi*f0*dt*log(Emax/It-pow(beta0,2));
00035  return -xi*f0*dt*log(Emax/It);
00036 }
00037 
00038 
00039 double target::straggling_gauss(double f0, double dt, long* d)
00040 {
00041  double Rz=gasdev(d); 
00042  return Rz*sqrt(delta_rms_2*f0*dt);  
00043 }

00045 
00046 double target::straggling_landau(double f0, double dt, long *d)
00047 {
00048  float rantmp;
00049  double lambda_mean=-0.422-pow(beta0,2)-log(f0*dt*kappa);
00050  double lambda_max=0.60715+1.1934*lambda_mean+(0.67794+0.052382*lambda_mean)*exp(0.94753+0.74442*lambda_mean);
00051  double ranl; 
00052  do {
00053      rantmp=ran1(d);
00054      ranl=ranlan_(&rantmp);
00055     } while (ranl > lambda_max );  
00056  return xi*f0*dt*(ranl+0.422+pow(beta0,2)+log(kappa*f0*dt))/(pow(beta0,2)*E0);
00057 
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 double target::straggling_vavilov(double f0, double dt, long *d)
00062 {
00063  float tmp=ran1(d);
00064  float rka=dt*f0*kappa;
00065  if(rka < 0.01 || rka > 10.0)
00066          { cout << "Vavilov: kappa=" << rka << endl; exit(0); }
00067  float bet2=pow(beta0,2);
00068  const int j=-1;
00069  coedin_(&rka,&bet2,&j);
00070  return xi*dt*f0*dinvav_(&tmp)/E0;      
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 double target::straggling_single(double f0, double dt, long *d)
00075 {
00076  float rantmp=ran1(d);
00077  if (xi*dt*f0/It > 1.0 ) { cout << "target: xi/I >1 !" << endl; exit(0); }
00078  if (rantmp > xi*dt*f0/It) return 0.0; 
00079  double denergy=1.0/(1.0/It-rantmp/(xi*dt*f0));
00080  if (denergy > Emax) return 0.0; //Emax/(pow(beta0,2)*E0);
00081  return denergy/(pow(beta0,2)*E0);
00082 }
